plot outline: Jilebi is the story of a confrontation between villager Sreekuttan and his city-bred nephews. Sreekuttan has his life happily confined to his farm and his pet crops. Far away, in Dubai, there is a family crisis and he is forced to take responsibility of his two Dubai-bred nephews. The kids hate leaving Dubai and are determined to make life miserable for Sreekuttan so that they are sent back to Dubai. The confrontation begins and leads to surprises - some sour, some sweet..
title: Jilebi
plot: _Jilebi_ (qv) is the story of a confrontation between villager Sreekuttan and his city-bred nephews. Sreekuttan has his life happily confined to his farm and his pet crops. Far away, in Dubai, there is a family crisis and he is forced to take responsibility of his two Dubai-bred nephews. The kids hate leaving Dubai and are determined to make life miserable for Sreekuttan so that they are sent back to Dubai. The confrontation begins and leads to surprises - some sour, some sweet..
